FILE
  HareDeclarationsImpl(DECLARATIONS)
    HareGeneralDeclarationImpl(GENERAL_DECLARATION)
      HareGlobalDeclarationImpl(GLOBAL_DECLARATION)
        PsiElement(LET_KW)('let')
        HareGlobalBindingsImpl(GLOBAL_BINDINGS)
          HareGlobalBindingImpl(GLOBAL_BINDING)
            HareIdentifierPathImpl(IDENTIFIER_PATH)
              PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('a')
            PsiElement(COLON)(':')
            HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
              HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                  HareIntegerTypeImpl(INTEGER_TYPE)
                    PsiElement(I32_TYPE)('i32')
            PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
            HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
              HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                  HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                    PsiElement(DECIMAL_DIGITS)('1234567890')
          PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
          HareGlobalBindingImpl(GLOBAL_BINDING)
            HareIdentifierPathImpl(IDENTIFIER_PATH)
              PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('b')
            PsiElement(COLON)(':')
            HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
              HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                  HareIntegerTypeImpl(INTEGER_TYPE)
                    PsiElement(I32_TYPE)('i32')
            PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
            HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
              HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                  HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                    PsiElement(HEX_DIGITS)('0x1234567890abcdefABCDEF')
          PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
          HareGlobalBindingImpl(GLOBAL_BINDING)
            HareIdentifierPathImpl(IDENTIFIER_PATH)
              PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('c')
            PsiElement(COLON)(':')
            HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
              HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                  HareIntegerTypeImpl(INTEGER_TYPE)
                    PsiElement(I32_TYPE)('i32')
            PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
            HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
              HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                  HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                    PsiElement(OCTAL_DIGITS)('0o1234567')
          PsiElement(COMMA)(',')
          HareGlobalBindingImpl(GLOBAL_BINDING)
            HareIdentifierPathImpl(IDENTIFIER_PATH)
              PsiElement(IDENTIFIER)('d')
            PsiElement(COLON)(':')
            HareTypeImpl(TYPE)
              HareStorageClassImpl(STORAGE_CLASS)
                HareScalaTypeImpl(SCALA_TYPE)
                  HareIntegerTypeImpl(INTEGER_TYPE)
                    PsiElement(I32_TYPE)('i32')
            PsiElement(ASSIGN)('=')
            HareExpressionImpl(EXPRESSION)
              HarePlanExpressionImpl(PLAN_EXPRESSION)
                HareConstantImpl(CONSTANT)
                  HareIntegerConstantImpl(INTEGER_CONSTANT)
                    PsiElement(BIN_DIGITS)('0b010101')
      PsiElement(EOS)(';')
